resources.string: If You Were Batman \r\n Your Superhero Name Would Be?
exceptional-but-not-superhuman fictional characters like Batman, Doc Savage and Green Arrow may be classified as superheroes although they do not have any actual superpowers,

Alien - different in nature or character 
 
 Alter Ego - characters whose alter ego is not known to everyone, superhero secret identities are often considered alter egos 
 
 Antagonist - a person or a group of people who oppose the main character(s) 
 
 Archenemy - a principal enemy 
 
 Extraterrestrial - coming from or existing outside the earth or its atmosphere 
 
 Fortress - any place of exceptional security; stronghold 
 
 Henchmen - a lackey, always there to do the master's bidding 
 
\ Lair - a secluded or hidden place, especially a secret retreat or base of operations; a hideout or hideaway 
 
 Nemisis - an opponent or rival whom a person cannot best or overcome 
 
 Protagonist - the main character, often the "good guy" 
\ 
\ Secret Identity - a character develops a separate persona 
 
 SideKick - assistants to crime-fighting heroes 
 
 Superhero - character possessing extraordinary talents, supernatural phenomena, or superhuman powers and dedicated to protecting the public. 
\ 
\ Superpower - superhuman ability 
 
 Villain - a character who tends to have a negative effect on other characters

Advanced Telepathy, Telekenisis, Density Control, Regenerative Ability, Directed Energy Attacks, Strength, Endurance, Phase Shifting, Shape Size, Xray Vision, Forcefield Protection, Invisibility, Flight, Speed
Super Strength, Durability, Control over Sea Life, Exceptional Swimming Ability, Water Breathing
King of the 7 Seas, The \"Dweller in the Depths\", Aquatic Ace, Marine Marvel
Exceptional Martial Arts and Combat Strategy Skills, Inexhaustible Wealth, Brillian Deductive Reasoning Skill, Advanced Technology
Super Strength, Invunerability, Flight, Combat Skill and Strategy, Superhuman Agility, Healing Factor, Magic Weaponry
Super Strength, Invunerability, Flight, Super Speed, Superhuman Hearing, Heat Vision, Healing Factor
Hard Light Constructs, Instant Weaponry, Force Fields, Flight, Durability, Alien Technology
Alan Wellington Scott, Sentinel, The White King, Parallax, Spectre
Superhuman Speed, Superhuman Agility, Intangibility, Cosmic Treadmill Time Travel
Scarlet Speedster, The Fastest Man Alive
